title: water_level_drop_in_farm_canal
summary: Observed water level reduction in MaMeeFarm canal after inflow from cornfield.
description: This data unit records the water level condition of the MaMeeFarm canal on the morning of 2026-01-05. Water that flowed into the canal from a neighboring cornfield on 2026-01-04 (referenced in data unit 00027) was not retained due to the canal being an earthen pond. The water level decreased approximately 45 centimeters from the previously observed level.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
